name: Dark Deception

reviews: this game is really really hard but its amazing i this hate the pirates i hated that level so muchhhh i like it and its nostalgic

I have played the first 2 levels, the gameplay is quite literally the same each time with some unique ways to defeat the new characters but not different enough for me to continue, having to play that stupid crystal collecting minigame each time is so dumb, unless you like aimlessly collecting crystals for no reason and getting jump scared by some bullshit entity that came out of no where with 0 indication that they are nearby, plus this game isnt even scary, I got jumped by a falling cardboard thing and thats the only thing I got scared by. I was more frustrated than anything by the bullshit "gameplay" (if you can even call it that). I've seen that nurse and ngl would tap but that ain't going to get me hooked into the game.
if they would fix the minor glitches it would be a perfect game..........
this game is soo good im waiting on the chapter 5 and im READY
the game restarted me over now i have too do it all over again

short_description: Death awaits you in Dark Deception, a story-driven first-person horror maze game. There's nowhere to hide & nowhere to catch your breath. Run or die - it's your choice. Trapped in a realm of nightmarish mazes with a mysterious woman, your only hope of survival is to find a way to escape.
